docs.lead_paragraph: A review of studies has found that planned home birth holds more than twice the risk for death from the ages of 1 week to 1 month compared with planned hospital birth.

headline.main: Home Birth May Add a Wrinkle
headline.print_headline: Home Birth May Add Some Risks

docs.snippet: A review of studies has found that planned home birth holds more than twice the risk for death from the ages of 1 week to 1 month compared with planned hospital birth.

docs.lead_paragraph: His preferred get-up is a plain white lab coat. He often raps from the perspective of a disease. And his latest track is an ode to mass-transit safety. As rappers go, Dr. John D. Clarke is more P.S.A. than Dr. Dre. But he has started to attract attention for his unique niche: the public service rap.
docs.abstract: City Room blog entry on Dr John D clarke, New York City physician who raps about health and public safety (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: Offending delicate sensibilities is not exactly a challenge for the creative team at "Family Guy," the animated Fox comedy that has broadcast episodes about the legalization of marijuana and the existence (or non-existence) of God, and a show about Down syndrome that drew it into an unintended conflict with Sarah Palin.

docs.lead_paragraph: His preferred get-up is a plain white lab coat. He often raps from the perspective of a disease. And his latest track is an ode to mass-transit safety.

headline.main: A Physician's a Musician, and Safety Is His Mission

docs.abstract: While waiting for a train, use your brain, use your mind / On the platform, stay behind the yellow line. And more transit safety advice from lab-coated king of public-service-announcement rap.

docs.lead_paragraph: Times are dreary — in the economy, in the national mood, overseas. Isn’t anything positive happening? We tried hard to find better news out there.
